job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltpgtwere building fullyelectric farm machines for sustainable and regenerative agriculture we have received a national science foundation sbir grant to do research on computer vision for understanding plant geometry this is a challenging problem in farm fields where many plants can overlap and occlude one another were looking for a remote software developer to help with building and running the software involved in this research the grant period is months but if the project goes well there is a good chance that the work will continue after thatltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtrequirementsltpgtltulgtltligtexperience with cltligtltligtexperience with pythonltligtltligtexperience with image processing andor computer vision algorithmsltligtltligtexperience with pytorch andor tensorflowltligtltligtbased in usltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtoptionalltpgtltulgtltligtexperience with developing and running machine learning models on awsltligtltligtexperience with opencvltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtto apply please send a resume along with a link to some c andor python code that you have writtenltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtcompensation kyear for months plus health insuranceltpgt
